question: What significant cultural title does the Old Town of Toruń, Poland hold since 1997?
true_answer: It is listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
asked_question_translated: Kateri pomemben kulturni naziv ima staro mesto Torunj na Poljskem od leta 1997?
answer: Staro mesto Torunj na Poljskem nosi naziv Unescove svetovne dediščine od leta 1997.
answer_translated_eng: The Old Town of Torunj in Poland has been a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 1997.
